spd.name: Concusive Blast
spd.description: When Cyclops makes a ranged combat attack and deals damage to an opposing character, the character is knocked back equal to the damage dealt.

spd.name: Bouncing Beast
spd.description: Beast can use Charge and Leap/Climb. When using Charge, he breaks away automatically and can continue to use the res of his halved movement (if any) after making the attack.

def.name: Bodyguard
def.description: Strong Guy can use Defend and Toughness.

def.name: Assimilation
def.description: Box can use Toughness. Once per round, when Box is adjacent to an object, as a free action you can remove the object from the game and heal Box of 2 damage.

dmg.name: Mass Absorption
dmg.description: When Box occupies hindering terrain, he has the giant damage symbol.

spd.name: Coordination
spd.description: Cuckoo can use Mind Control. When Cuckoo is given a move action, she can carry up to two other adjacent Cuckoos.

def.name: Hive Mind
def.description: When Cuckoo is given an action, you can modify one of her combat values (including range) by +1 until the end of the round for each other Cuckoo adjacent to her.

dmg.name: Fastball Special
dmg.description: Colossus can use telekinesis, but only option 3. When using telekinesis Colossus can treat and adjacent friendly character that has a point value more then 30 and a star damage symbol as if they it were a light object, but the character is not destoryed in the attack. After the attack is resolved modify the characters attack value and damge vaule by -2 until the end of the turn, deal it 1 unavoidable damage, and place it in the square nearest to the target to which colossus has a clear line of fire. If the square is not adjacent to the target, deal the character 1 additional unaviodable damage.

spd.name: Cloak
spd.description: The Hood can use Leap Climb and Stealth.

spd.name: Chemming
spd.description: Miek can use Charge and Plasticity.

def.name: Absorb
def.description: When Absorbing Man is adjacent to or occupies hindering, blocking, or elevated terrain, he can use Invulnerability. When Absorbing Man can't use Invulnerability, he can use Toughness.

atk.name: Omnimorph
atk.description: Morph can use Perplex, but he can target only himself.

spd.name: Subsonic Speed
spd.description: Mimic can use Charge and Running Shot.

atk.name: Mimicry
atk.description: Mimic can use Energy Explosion and Super Strength.

atk.name: Transformed by the Mists
atk.description: Gorgon can use Quake and Super Strength. When Gorgon uses Super Strength, he can pick up only standard objects, but they are not required to be used as part of a close combat attack when Gorgon uses Quake.

def.name: Slippery
def.description: Iceman can use Toughness. When an opposing character moves and becomes adjacent to Iceman, roll a d6. On a result of 1-3, the character is immediately knocked back from Iceman a number of squares equal to the result, in a direction of your choosing.

atk.name: Programmed Assassin
atk.description: X-23 can use Stealth. When she occupies hindering terrain and makes a close-combat attack, modify her attack value by +1.

def.name: Cerebro
def.description: Professor X can use Perplex. When Professor X he can use it normally or choose a single keyword and affect every target character 10 or fewer squares from Professor X that possesses that keyword (including himself, if he possesses the keyword) and to which Professor X has a clear line of fire

spd.name: Shadowy Attack
spd.description: Gambit can use Leap/Climb, Running Shot, and Stealth.

dmg.name: Cajun Charm
dmg.description: Gambit can use Perplex, but he must be 4 or fewer squares from the target.

spd.name: Smash
spd.description: Green Scar can use Leap/Climb. Give Green Scar a power action; move him up to his speed value, and then give him one close combat action as a free action.

def.name: Toughest One There Is
def.description: Green Scar can use Impervious and Willpower.

spd.name: Fly-By
spd.description: Archangel can use Charge. When he does, he can continue to use the rest of his halved movement (if any) after making the attack.

atk.name: Energy Harpoon
atk.description: Ahab can use Psychic Blast. When Ahab is given a ranged combat action, his line of fire ignores characters and hindering terrain.

dmg.name: Power Amplification
dmg.description: Fabian Cortez can use Perplex, but he can target only other friendly characters. When he uses perplex, roll a d6. On a result of 1-3, Perplex is used normally. On a 4 or 5, the chosen combat value is modified by +2 or -2 and the target is dealt 2 damage at the end of the turn. On a 6, the chosen combat value is modified by +3 or -3 and the target is dealt 1 unavoidable damage at the end of the turn.

spd.name: Telepathic Assault Jean Grey can use Mind Control and Running Shot. When she used RS, she can use MC as a free action instead of being given a ranged combat action.

dmg.name: Telepathic Empathy
dmg.description: Jean Grey can use Outwit. If JG is countering a power when a friendly character 6 or fewer squares from her to which she has a clear line of fire makes a critical miss immediately deal 1 damage to Jean Grey.

dmg.name: Leech
dmg.description: Each time an opposing character takes damage from a close combat or ranged combat attack made by Omega Red, heal Omega Red of 1 damage; this power is not optional.

dmg.name: Strategic Database
dmg.description: Danger can use Probability Control. Her powers can't be countered, and no opposing characters 10 or fewer squares from Danger to which she has a clear line of fire at the beginning of any action can have their combat values modified during that action if the modified value would be higher.

def.name: Untouchable
def.description: Unus the Untouchable can use Impervious and Super Senses.

dmg.name: Bounce
dmg.description: Any successful close combat attack made by Unus the Untouchable knocks the target back 3 squares. Unus the Untouchable does not otherwise knock back the targets of his attacks.

def.name: Minions of the Leader
def.description: The Leader can use Mastermind and Toughness. When the Leader uses Mastermind, he can treat any friendly character 4 or fewer squares away to which he has a clear line of fire asif it were adjacent.

dmg.name: Intellect
dmg.description: The Leader can use Outwit and Probability Control.

spd.name: Cosmic Evolution
spd.description: The High Evolutionary can use the Power Cosmic team ability.

def.name: Mind Over Matter
def.description: The High Evolutionary can use Barrier and Super Senses.

dmg.name: Growth
dmg.description: The High Evolutionary has the Giant damage symbol.

spd.name: Murderbots
spd.description: Give Arcade a power action. Choose up to two standard objects 10 or fewer squares from Arcade to which he has a clear line of fire when he is given the action, and move each object as if it were a character that has Arcade's speed value.

atk.name: Deathtrap
atk.description: Once per turn as a free action, Arcade can remove from the game any object 10 or fewer squares from Arcade to which he has a clear line of fire and deal 1 damage to each character adjacent to the object.

def.name: Murderworld
def.description: Arcade can use Barrier (as if he had a range of 10) and Mastermind.

atk.name: Attack Drain
atk.description: Give Super-adaptiod a power action. As a free action it can use any stanard named attack power possessed by an opposing character 4 or fewer squares away to which it has a clear line of fire. Super-adaptiod can use the power until it loses attack drain, attack drain is countered, or it uses attack drain to use a differnt power. After the resolution of an action in which Super-adaptiod uses a power via attack drain roll 2d6. On a result of 2-5 deal 1 penetrating dame to Super-Adaptiod.

def.name: Defense Drain
def.description: When Super-Adaptoid s given a power action as a free action it can use any standard or named defense power possessed by an opposing character 4 or fewer squares away to which it has a clear line of fire. Super-Adaptiod can use the power until it loses defense drain, defense drain is countered, or it uses defense drain to use a differnt power. After the resolution of an action in which Super-adaptiod uses a power via defense drain roll 2d6. On a result of 2-5 deal 1 penetrating damage to Super-Adaptoid.

spd.name: Turnabout
spd.description: When Wrecker is the target of a close combat attack resulting in a critical hit or critical miss, if he possesses turnabout after the resolution of the attack he can as a free action target the character that attacked him.

def.name: Mummudrai
def.description: Cassandra Nova can use Mastermind, Shape Change, and willpower.

spd.name: Flight Stablizers
spd.description: Hulkbuster can use Charge and Running Shot. Hulkbuster is adjacent to a giant character only when he is within 1 square of it.

atk.name: Weapons As Big As the Fight
atk.description: Hulkbuster can use Energy Explosion and Super Strength.

spd.name: Mind Games
spd.description: Mastermind can use Mind Control and Stealth. Modify Mastermind's attack value by +2 when he uses Incapacitate or Mind Control.

def.name: Chimera
def.description: Mastermind can use Mastermind and Super Senses.

dmg.name: Headmistress
dmg.description: Emma Frost can use Leadership and Perplex.

atk.name: Goddess
atk.description: Storm can use Energy Explosion, Force Blast, Quake and Smoke Cloud.

dmg.name: Megamorph
dmg.description: Warskull can use Outwit and Shape Change.

spd.name: Molecular Control
spd.description: Can use Phasing/teleport, Plasticity and Shape Change.

atk.name: Psionic Power
atk.description: can use Incapacitate, Mind Control, and Psychic Blast. When Apoc would take pushing Damage, roll 1 d6, On a result of a 4-6, he does not take pushing damage instead.

def.name: The Strong Will Survive
def.description: Apoc Can use Regeneration and Toughness.

atk.name: Gamma-Saturated
atk.description: Maestro can use Quake and Super Strength. Give Maestro a power action and he can make a close combat attack as a free action; modify his attack value by +2 for the attack.

atk.name: Sadistic
atk.description: Dark Beast can use Exploit Weakness.

dmg.name: Cruel Experiment
dmg.description: Give Dark Beast a power action and roll a d6. On a result of 3-6, give an action token to an adjacent opposing character with zero or one action token. On a 5 or 6, deal 2 unpreventable damage to an adjacent opposing character. On a 6, deal 1 damage to each adjacent opposing character. Apply all applicable results, which may be split among different characters.

spd.name: Squash
spd.description: The Rampaging Hulk can use Leap/Climb. Imeediately after the resolution of a move action in which the Rampaging Hulk uses Leap/Climb, he can use Quake as a free action.

dmg.name: Smash
dmg.description: The Rampaging Hulk can use Close Combat Expert. At the end of your turn, if there are fewer than six objects in the game, your last opponent to take an action chooses a light standard object from outside the game and places it 6 or fewer squares from the Rampaging Hulk in an unoccupied square to which the Rampaging Hulk has a clear line of fire.
